# AttributeAlignment.AppendAttributePadding method

Append padding to a StringBuilder as appropriate for an attribute.

```csharp
public void AppendAttributePadding(XAttribute? attribute, StringBuilder stringBuilder)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| attribute | An attribute (or null) from `myXElement.Attribute(aa.Name)` |
| stringBuilder | Where to append the spaces, if required. |
